welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Andover, a charming city known for its historic New England charm and picturesque landscapes. We hope you have a delightful stay and take some time to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is the main hub for all commercial flights at Boire Field Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights at Boire Field Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free by selecting 'BoireFieldWiFi' and entering the password 'BFAPass123'.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Logan Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Logan Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Logan Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection every 30 minutes.
